attributes.action: allow the broadcast of NATS Air Traffic Control via live feed on the internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Right across most of the world, aviation enthusiasts can broadcast from their home (via the internet). Sites exist in the US and Europe but in the UK we are stopped from doing this by antiquated legislation.

Please sign my petition to allow the broadcast of ATC frequencies in the UK over the internet by those people who wish to provide them.
